title: Path To Origin (Part 1)
body:
Path To Origin (Part 1)

---) Fruit Of Vitality: Upon consumption, it can permanently increase the stamina and endurance of the user by 10 points each.

Evan looked at the white berry-sized fruit in his hand and tossed it inside his mouth.

As he chewed the fruit, a sour flavour exploded inside his mouth, forcing him to close his eyes. Although the fruit was sour beyond belief, Evan still forced himself to gulp it down; simultaneously, two notifications flashed in front of his eyes.

(+10 Endurance)

(+10 Stamina)

Seeing the notifications, Evan nodded his head in satisfaction and drank a large mouthful of sweet fruit juice to clean his mouth, which was drying because of the sourness of the Fruit Of Vitality.

"Volac," After getting rid of the dryness of his mouth, he glanced at Volac, who was riding a wind and lightning sheep beside him.

Hearing Evan, Volac did not lift his head and passed a paper sheet to him.
